title: S13 Ep22: The Calling: The Life of an Exorcist
itunes:title: The Calling: The Life of an Exorcist
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS hears The Calling: The life of an Exorcist with Arch Bishop Ron Feyl.

Arch Bishop Ron Feyl has faced the twisted souls of demons and malevolent energy for years and has butted heads with true evil.

Now in retirement, Ron shares insights, and cringe worthy tales of wicked beings bent on the total destruction of pur humanity.

Get your paranormal fix at www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
